messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

int commented scheduled connection test failure and user failures sent saturday october re commented scheduled connection test failure failures thanks please make logged for we need completed regards manager sent october re commented scheduled connection test failure failures hello indeed there were issues when trying into sn users were prompted with message saying their credentials were valid but seems be fixed we able into our accounts per change follow up with engineer check if related thanks kind regards analyst sent saturday october re commented scheduled connection test failure failures further last note there currently tickets open for appear be result cr being implemented case cr process was followed properly we have key being impacted was made aware please can you advise if related thanks manager sent october commented scheduled connection test failure failures importance high hello requires check for please can you advise how can be progressed regards manager sent october commented scheduled connection test failure failures short description scheduled connection test failure failures click here view comments additional comments hi left spoke issue able connect server started error server servers failed scheduled connection test connection timed out failed connect server select record for action preview error server servers failed scheduled connection test connection timed out failed connect server next steps check with get back thank you additional comments hi please call australia globally thank you additional comments hi monitoring tool detected instance able connect server users able errors error server servers failed scheduled connection test connection timed out failed connect server information run seconds information retest failed server servers error server servers failed scheduled connection test connection timed out failed connect server users able warning returned for warning information found for warning returned for select record for action preview warning information found for thank you additional comments hello name assigned engineer for your incident work during hours part troubleshooting process personnel need access your instance order review impact your instance determine root cause if you need speak someone please use one contact our contact you then be able enter your incident or change number over phone have your call routed engineer owns incident or change if you need assistance outside you can call contact number another engineer assist you best regards transform australia globally soap engineering monitoring additional comments our monitoring detected issue with your instance being investigated for more information please contact technical or update incident ref msg
